testcase.name: Verify successful completion of an order purchase
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify successful completion of an order purchase Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.457s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.069s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.216s And User adds item 'fleece jacket' to the cart ... passed in 1.184s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.226s And User clicks on continue button ... passed in 1.195s And User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Doe', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.206s Then User clicks continue from checkout overview page ... passed in 1.216s When User verifies total amount as well as finishes the order ... passed in 1.203s Then Verify user should see the order confirmation page ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
